item.title: How Much Does Thibs Love His Former Players?
item.description: Tom Thibodeau loves his former players. Since taking over as coach of the TWolves, Thibs (who also serves of president of basketball operations) has acquired the services of no fewer than six players he coached on the Bulls: Jimmy Butler, Taj Gibson, Derrick Rose, Aaron Brooks, John Lucas III, and most recently Luol Deng…
